SharpMimeTools Documented Class Library

anmar.SharpMimeTools Namespace

Namespace hierarchy

Classes

Class Description
ABNF
SharpAttachment This class provides the basic functionality for handling attachments
SharpMessage This class provides a simplified way of parsing messages.
SharpMimeAddress rfc 2822 email address
SharpMimeHeader rfc 2822 header of a rfc 2045 entity
SharpMimeMessage rfc 2045 entity
SharpMimeTools
SharpTnefMessage Decodes ms-tnef streams (those winmail.dat attachments).

Enumeration Description
